thread.title: Anthony Davis on DeMarcus Cousins right before trade: 'He's a great player'
thread.title_full: Anthony Davis on DeMarcus Cousins right before trade: 'He's a great player'

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Anthony Davis on DeMarcus Cousins right before trade: 'He's a great player'
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Anthony Davis on DeMarcus Cousins right before trade: 'He's a great player' Anthony Davis discussed DeMarcus Cousins with reporters just before the trade broke. Post to Facebook Anthony Davis on DeMarcus Cousins right before trade: 'He's a great player' Anthony Davis discussed DeMarcus Cousins with reporters just before the trade broke.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/demarcus-cousins-trade-anthony-davis-pelicans-kings-all-star-media-room/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Anthony Davis on DeMarcus Cousins right before trade: 'He's a great player' Adi Joseph , USA TODAY Sports 12:20 a.m. ET Feb. 20, 2017 
(Photo: Kelley L Cox-USA TODAY Sports) 
NEW ORLEANS - Anthony Davis was already walking out of the NBA All-Star interview room, the last player or coach to be available to the media after Sunday's game, when The Vertical's report first dropped. — Adrian Wojnarowski (@WojVerticalNBA) February 20, 2017 Can confirm Kings-Pelicans deal: DeMarcus Cousins to NO for Buddy Hield, Tyreke Evans, Langston Galloway & a 2017 first and 2nd (Philly's) — Sam Amick (@sam_amick) February 20, 2017 
But one reporter did ask Davis about the reports that the teams were talking about such a trade. Davis was diplomatic about a rumor that he sort of was not allowed to talk about at all. 
From the NBA's official transcript of the news conference: Q: Anthony, you just said that, when the management is looking to acquire a new player, that you will give them your opinion. Now there are reports that the Pelicans might have talks with the Kings about a DeMarcus Cousins trade. What is your opinion on him and on the possibility of just getting him to New Orleans? Davis: He's a great player, dominant in this league, of course, with all the numbers he put up. But I haven't heard anything. So I'm going to let the management, once again, do what they do, and when the time is right, they'll come talk to me about it. Of course, DeMarcus is an elite player in this league. 
Davis and Cousins are Kentucky alumni - separated by two years - and Wildcats coach John Calipari has long made a point of building a community among his NBA-bound pupils. 
And by the way, that media room? A lot of stunned silence, and a lot of reporters on their phones. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/demarcus-cousins-trade-anthony-davis-pelicans-kings-all-star-media-room/ Most Popular
